ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Flexible_Packaging_Converted_3_Side_Seal', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Flexible_Packaging_Converted_Other', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Flexible_Packaging_Converted_Pillow_Pouch', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Flexible_Packaging_Converted_Stand_Up_Pouch', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PS_ONLY', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Shrink_Only'), INCLUDES(Finish__c, 'Other'), ISBLANK( Other_Finish__c))
